meanings.definition: To be derived jointly or in conjunction with something else.
meanings.sent1: The two friends coderived a plan to surprise their teacher.
meanings.sent2: The siblings coderived a story for their school project.
meanings.sent3: The puppies coderived a mischief to play on their owner.
meanings.sent4: Their laughter coderived a sense of joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The dancers coderived a beautiful routine for the performance.

meanings.definition: Having a common origin or source.
meanings.sent1: The coderived ideas led to a successful collaboration.
meanings.sent2: The team members shared a coderived passion for helping others.
meanings.sent3: The twins had a coderived sense of humor that always made others laugh.
meanings.sent4: Their coderived interests in music brought them closer together.
meanings.sent5: The siblings had a coderived love for nature, exploring the outdoors together.
